name: Ocean Rift
summary: Ocean Rift is the world's first VR aquatic safari park. Explore a vivid underwater world full of life including dolphins, sharks, turtles, sea snakes, rays, whales, manatees, sea lions and even prehistoric animals! You are free to swim around each of the 14 habitats using innovative motion controls or hand gestures. Activate the education mode to learn more about the animals you come across. There are over 40 fully narrated information points to find.
